channel.title: Creator of Worlds
channel.description: Recent content on Creator of Worlds

item.title: Books
item.description: I publish speculative fiction titles that you can purchase online, should you wish to encourage my writing habit. All of my digital works are available from the Kindle store. Check out my author page for easy access. My print works are available from either the Amazon or Barnes & Noble stores. Supremcy: Reformation Cast down and imprisoned in the age past, the gods left their creation to survive without guidance. Two brothers now struggle to unite the last of the ancient Orders.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I’m an author who writes things that he finds interesting. I’m mostly in the speculative fiction space.

item.title: Intro
item.description: Just and Intro about stuff and things. test test and more test Adding more stuff
